lang.textAreaP1: 位於內湖區的富勝汽車保修始於1989年，為台北市內湖區經營超過三十年的汽車保修廠，主要服務項目為專業日系品牌汽車維修與保養包含：三菱MITSUBISHI、豐田TOYOTA、日產Nissan、本田HONDA、福特Ford。
lang.textAreaP2: 富勝汽車保修擁有乾淨明亮寬敞的保修廠區、豐富技術和保修經驗技師群，以及全方位的優質專業服務與豐富經驗，精準到位為您的愛車安全把關。除了汽車保養和維修之外，富勝汽車保修還能滿足廣大車主消費者的其它需求，如：電腦診斷，引擎底盤，輪胎，鈑金，...等等。
lang.textInfo1: 富勝汽車保修亦是三菱汽車特約保修廠
lang.textInfo3: 台北市內湖區瑞光路76巷37號
lang.computerP: 提供精準檢測數據，讓專業技師能更準確對您的愛車提供相關保修資訊。
lang.engineP: 離合器、變速器...車輪、避震器...轉向軸、轉向橫拉杆...剎車盤、剎車片...，對行車安全非常重要。
lang.sheetP: 技師的工藝水準影響著品質，專業精確的施工過程，為您的愛車呈現煥然一新。
lang.tireP: 不正確的車輪或輪胎定位會導致愛車的輪胎磨損不均或提早磨損，輪胎平衡對於輪胎維護是有其必要性。

lang.textAreaP1: Fusheng automobile repair plant, located in Neihu District, started in 1989. It is an auto warranty factory that has been in operation for more than 30 years in Neihu District, Taipei City. The main service items are professional Japanese brand car repair and maintenance. Includes: MITSUBISHI, Toyota, Nissan, Honda, Ford.
lang.textAreaP2: Fusheng has a clean, bright and spacious warranty factory area, a group of technicians with rich technology and warranty experience, and a full range of high-quality professional services and rich experience to accurately control the safety of your car. In addition to car maintenance and repair, Fusheng can also meet other needs of the majority of car owners and consumers, such as: computer diagnostics, engine chassis, tires, sheet metal, ... and so on.
lang.textInfo1: Fusheng is also an authorized Mitsubishi Motors warranty company.
lang.textInfo3: No. 37, Ln. 76, Ruiguang Rd., Neihu Dist., Taipei City
lang.computerP: Provide accurate testing data, so that professional technicians can provide more accurate warranty information for your car.
lang.engineP: Clutches, transmissions... wheels, shock absorbers... steering shafts, tie rods... brake discs, brake pads... are very important for driving safety.
lang.sheetP: Technician's process level affects quality, professional and accurate construction process, showing a new look for your car.
lang.tireP: Incorrect wheel or tire positioning will cause uneven or early wear of your car's tires, and tire balance is necessary for tire maintenance.
